dct_description_sm: Prepared by Engineer, XV Corps. ; Reconnaisance by 165th Engr. C. Bn. 28 Dec. 1944.
Coordinates approximate and cover entire Maginot Line (Greenwich meridian).
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
Legend shows block houses (including unuseable), original Maginot line (including unuseable), observation posts, anti-tank ditches, barbed wires.
Maps made from various sheets of "Map of France 1:50,000," G.S.G.S. 4471.
Sheet 2 of 15. [From Bitche to Hambach, France; from G.S.G.S. sheets 36/13-37/13]
